MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML5 postcode area of Coatbridge. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7.10pm as requested by the emergency services and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:19PM on Thursday 14 January 2021.
